member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Source
member.summary: The AudioSource to play through. If the AudioSource is not found when transitioning to this state for the first time, AnimatorPlayAudio will be disabled.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.VolumeApplySettings
member.summary: How to apply the volume setting

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.PitchApplySettings
member.summary: How to apply the pitch setting

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Clips
member.summary: A list of AudioClips that can be applied to the AudioSource when transitioning to this state.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.ClipsApplySettings
member.summary: How to apply the clip setting

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Loop
member.summary: Whether the AudioSource's looping should be set enabled or disabled when transitioning to this state.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.LoopApplySettings
member.summary: How to apply the looping setting

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.DelayInSeconds
member.summary: The delay before "Play On Enter" plays a clip, if enabled. Clamped from 0 to 60 seconds. (Default: 0 seconds)

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.PlayOnEnter
member.summary: To play the audiosource on enter, after possibly stopping it first

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.StopOnEnter
member.summary: To stop the audio source on enter

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.PlayOnExit
member.summary: To play the audio source on exit

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.StopOnExit
member.summary: To stop the audio source on exit

member.name: T:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio
member.summary: This behavior modifies an AudioSource when transitioning to the animation state. It can change the audio clip, pitch, or loop value, and it can play the AudioSource.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.ParameterName
member.summary: The name of the "int" type avatar parameter that determines which audio clip is chosen. If the parameter cannot be found, the first clip is chosen instead.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Volume
member.summary: The random volume range for the AudioSource.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Pitch
member.summary: The random pitch range for the AudioSource.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.SourcePath
member.summary: The path to the AudioSource relative to the avatar's root transform. If the AudioSource is not found when transitioning to this state for the first time, AnimatorPlayAudio will be disabled.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.PlaybackOrder
member.summary: Determines which audio clip is chosen when transitioning to this state.

member.name: T:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Order
member.summary: The order in which audio clips are chosen.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Order.Random
member.summary: Chooses a random clip. (Default)

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Order.UniqueRandom
member.summary: Chooses a random audio clip, but not the same clip twice in a row.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Order.Roundabout
member.summary: Chooses the first clip, then the second, and so on. After the last clip, the first clip is chosen again.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.Order.Parameter
member.summary: Chooses a clip based on an "int" type avatar parameter. For example, if the parameter is 0, the first clip is chosen. The parameter must be defined in the avatar's Expressions Parameters. If the parameter cannot be found, the first clip is chosen instead.

member.name: T:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.ApplySettings
member.summary: Determines when the settings are applied to the audio source.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.ApplySettings.AlwaysApply
member.summary: The setting is applied to the audio source, even if it is currently playing a clip.

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.ApplySettings.ApplyIfStopped
member.summary: The setting is applied to the audio source unless it's already playing a clip. (Default)

member.name: F:VRC.SDKBase.VRC_AnimatorPlayAudio.ApplySettings.NeverApply
member.summary: The setting is unused and greyed out in the inspector.
